verses.verse: He who dwells <S%H3427><s%> in the shelter <S%H5643><s%> of the Most <S%H9411><s%> High <S%H9411><s%> Will abide <S%H3885><s%> in the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of the Almighty. <S%H7706><s%>
I will say <S%H559><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "My refuge <S%H4268><s%> and my fortress, <S%H4686><s%> My God, <S%H430><s%> in whom I trust! <S%H982><s%>"
For it is He who delivers <S%H5337><s%> you from the snare <S%H6341><s%> of the trapper, <S%H3353><s%> And from the deadly <S%H1942><s%> pestilence. <S%H1698><s%>

He will cover <S%H5526><s%> you with His pinions, <S%H84><s%> And under <S%H8478><s%> His wings <S%H3671><s%> you may seek <S%H2620><s%> refuge; <S%H2620><s%> His faithfulness <S%H571><s%> is a shield <S%H6793><s%> and bulwark. <S%H5507><s%>
You will not be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of the terror <S%H6343><s%> by night, <S%H3915><s%> Or of the arrow <S%H2671><s%> that flies <S%H5774><s%> by day; <S%H3119><s%>
Of the pestilence <S%H1698><s%> that stalks <S%H1980><s%> in darkness, <S%H652><s%> Or of the destruction <S%H6986><s%> that lays <S%H7703><s%> waste <S%H7703><s%> at noon. <S%H6672><s%>

A thousand <S%H505><s%> may fall <S%H5307><s%> at your side, <S%H6654><s%> And ten <S%H7233><s%> thousand <S%H7233><s%> at your right <S%H3225><s%> hand; <S%H3225><s%> [But] it shall not approach <S%H5066><s%> you.
You will only <S%H7534><s%> look <S%H5027><s%> on with your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> And see <S%H7200><s%> the recompense <S%H8011><s%> of the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>
For you have made <S%H7760><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> my refuge, <S%H4268><s%> [Even] the Most <S%H9411><s%> High, <S%H9411><s%> your dwelling <S%H4583><s%> place. <S%H4583><s%>
No <S%H3808><s%> evil <S%H9567><s%> will befall <S%H579><s%> you, Nor <S%H3808><s%> will any plague <S%H5061><s%> come <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> your tent. <S%H168><s%>
For He will give <S%H6680><s%> His angels <S%H4397><s%> charge <S%H6680><s%> concerning you, To guard <S%H8104><s%> you in all <S%H3605><s%> your ways. <S%H1870><s%>
They will bear <S%H5375><s%> you up in their hands, <S%H3709><s%> Lest <S%H6435><s%> you strike <S%H5062><s%> your foot <S%H7272><s%> against a stone. <S%H68><s%>

You will tread <S%H1869><s%> upon the lion <S%H7826><s%> and cobra, <S%H6620><s%> The young <S%H3715><s%> lion <S%H3715><s%> and the serpent <S%H8577><s%> you will trample <S%H7429><s%> down. <S%H7429><s%>

"Because <S%H3588><s%> he has loved <S%H2836><s%> Me, therefore I will deliver <S%H6403><s%> him; I will set <S%H7682><s%> him [securely] on high, <S%H7682><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he has known <S%H3045><s%> My name. <S%H8034><s%>
"He will call <S%H7121><s%> upon Me, and I will answer <S%H6030><s%> him; I will be with him in trouble; <S%H6869><s%> I will rescue <S%H2502><s%> him, and honor <S%H3513><s%> him.
"With a long <S%H753><s%> life <S%H3117><s%> I will satisfy <S%H7646><s%> him, And let him behold <S%H7200><s%> My salvation. <S%H3444><s%>"
